text: Nation

A look at Winchester and Sunrise Manor, two areas in Eastern part of Las Vegas and have a majority Latino population higher than the state. Obama 2012 did the best and Donald Trump improved from Romney 2012 meaning Clinton and Biden slipped.

A look at the presidential election results of the city of Philadelphia which is important for statewide victory for democrats. Philadelphia is also a majority black city, they live in the dark blue areas as they are a strong voting block for the democrats.





Obama`08 dominated the city of Philadelphia against McCain, he even did very well in the white working class area in the north of the city.

Obama`12 also did well even though he lost about 1,000 votes mainly due to low turnout in the black neighborhood. He maintained his support in the north but the story was Romney doing worse than McCain did 2008.





The change from 2008 and 2012 for Obama. 2012 had turnout drop from 2008, green areas is where he did better in â€™12 and blue areas are where he did worse from â€™08.





Map showing how McCainâ€™08 and Romneyâ€™12 performed. McCain did well in the white areas while Romney did well in the black and Latino areas of the city.





Turnout in 2012 increased from 2008 mainly in white areas while it decreased in mainly black areas.



 Back to top

How the affluent Town of Milton voted on a ballot question for building multi-family homes in a accordance to zoning law passed by the state legislature. Voters rejected the zoning law by 8%. The NO vote came mainly from high income white parts of the town which is 70% white.

title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to my website where I have different projectx!



 Back to top

A look at the polls from the 2020 presidential election between Donald Trump and Joe Biden by their ratings from 538.com. The Aâ€™s polls had Biden at or above 50% through the eleven month and they underestimated Trump 80% of the time having him below 45%.









The B and B/C polls were the worst for Trump as they put him below 45% to 40% and had Biden reach the 50% after the summer.









The C and C/D polls were surprisingly better as they didnâ€™t diverge too much, they had Trump hoovering above 45% and Biden above 50% but there not many polls conducted.









The polls without ratings didnâ€™t do too well the few of them as they had Trump below 40%.









All the polls were download from 538.com, separated by their ratings and calculated on a 2-day moving average using the rstudio zoo library.
